name: Insurgence - Chains of Renegade
description: Insurgence is a 2D Role Playing Game with Visual Novel elements, Enjoy the classic RPG experience and discover the meaning of redemption and friendship within the Insurgence movement.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ 3.20 GHz or Intel Core2 Duo E6850 3.00GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5450 / Intel HD 2500 / Nvidia GT 420 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo 16 Bit 44.1 Khz Additional Notes: On High Refresh Rate Monitor, Please set it to 60hz or 59hz
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955 3.20 GHz or Intel Core i5-760 2.80 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450  / Intel HD 4000 / Nvidia GT 710 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo 24 Bit 192 Khz Additional Notes: For more information see troubleshooting documentation
